entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
